title: How to Create a Great Dynasty Team on NCAA 08

steps.headline: Go buy NCAA 08 for Xbox 360 or PS3.
In Pre-season recruiting, select make  a prospect.
Make a bunch of punters and kickers, that you plan to use at other positions( like QB and RB).
Make Punting or Kicking Skills terrible.
Change his position in the off-season.
You're done.
steps.description: Next year go for the BCS Championship

text: Go buy NCAA 08 for Xbox 360 or PS3.  Start the game.  Go to Dynasty Mode.  Select a 1-3 star school.  In Pre-season recruiting, select make  a prospect.  Make a bunch of punters and kickers, that you plan to use at other positions( like QB and RB).  Make Punting or Kicking Skills terrible.  Make your desired position great.  Recruit him throughout the year.  Get him to commit.  Change his position in the off-season.  You're done. Next year go for the BCS Championship
